Posts.Content: TheSon wrote: I'm 35.  My mother was diagnosed today. Small tumor 1/20 inch.  She is planning surgery and some testing with radioactive dye to detect if it is anywhere else.  My mother is everything to me.  I don't want her to see how upset I am.   What do offer her?  What do I say?  What do I do? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Mother Diagnosed TheSon Nicole_Bronx
